org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc

接口 RpcGateway

  • 所有已知子接口:
    AkkaBasedEndpoint, CheckpointCoordinatorGateway, DispatcherGateway, FencedRpcGateway<F>, InfoMessageListenerRpcGateway, JobManagerGateway, JobMasterGateway, KvStateRegistryGateway, ResourceManagerGateway, RestfulGateway, RpcServer, SlotPoolGateway, TaskExecutorGateway
    所有已知实现类:
    AkkaInvocationHandler, AkkaJobManagerGateway, Dispatcher, FencedAkkaInvocationHandler, FencedRpcEndpoint, JobMaster, MesosResourceManager, ResourceManager, RpcEndpoint, SlotPool, StandaloneDispatcher, StandaloneResourceManager, TaskExecutor, YarnResourceManager

    public interface RpcGateway
    Rpc gateway interface which has to be implemented by Rpc gateways.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getAddress()
      Returns the fully qualified address under which the associated rpc endpoint is reachable.
      java.lang.String getHostname()
      Returns the fully qualified hostname under which the associated rpc endpoint is reachable.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAddress

        java.lang.String getAddress()
        Returns the fully qualified address under which the associated rpc endpoint is reachable.
        返回:
        Fully qualified (RPC) address under which the associated rpc endpoint is reachable

      • getHostname

        java.lang.String getHostname()
        Returns the fully qualified hostname under which the associated rpc endpoint is reachable.
        返回:
        Fully qualified hostname under which the associated rpc endpoint is reachable
